title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Team Capacity Building Course Based on Medical Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical procedures and team-based work experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Explain at least three effective communication strategies among team members through medical simulation scenarios.
Achieve an 80%+ success rate in teamwork-based problem-solving skills in simulations reflecting real clinical situations.

Learners can analyze team performance data (productivity, error rate, collaboration metrics, etc.) using AI-based simulation tools like NVIDIA Omniverse, derive three or more specific improvement items (e.g., process optimization, resource reallocation, communication enhancement), establish and execute an action plan (task division, role assignment, schedule management) within two weeks, and report progress (over 70%) and obstacles in weekly check-in meetings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
